description.title: **SPANISH **Terms
description.body1: **SPANISH **1. KWH: The way electricity is measured, Power Used x Time Used
description.body2: **SPANISH **2. Power Supply Charges: The cost to generate electricitu7
description.body3: **SPANISH **3. Distribution: The cost to maintain power lines and to deliver electricty to customer
description.body4: **SPANISH **4. Service Charges: Monthly service charge for administrative costs
description.body5: **SPANISH **1. CCF: 100 cubic feet - a way to measure gas
description.body6: **SPANISH **2. Customer Charge: Monthly service charge for administrative costs
description.body7: **SPANISH **3. Gas Distribution Charge: The cost to deliver gas to the customer
description.body8: **SPANISH **4. Gas Cost Recovery(GCR): The actual cost of gas
